refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: The fdf_create creates a new FDF document. This function is needed if one would like to populate input fields in a PDF document with data.

example.title: Populating a PDF document
example.programlisting:
<?php
$outfdf = fdf_create();
fdf_set_value($outfdf, "volume", $volume, 0);

fdf_set_file($outfdf, "http:/testfdf/resultlabel.pdf");
fdf_save($outfdf, "outtest.fdf");
fdf_close($outfdf);
Header("Content-type: application/vnd.fdf");
$fp = fopen("outtest.fdf", "r");
fpassthru($fp);
unlink("outtest.fdf");
?>
